author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Payment Data Systems Q1 Loss Per Share $0.09
text:
May 15 (Reuters) - Payment Data Systems Inc:
* PAYMENT DATA SYSTEMS ANNOUNCES RESULTS FOR THE FIRST QUARTER OF 2018
* Q1 REVENUE ROSE 108 PERCENT TO $5.8 MILLION * MORE THAN 2.8 MILLION TOTAL TRANSACTIONS WERE PROCESSED DURING Q1 2018
* MORE THAN $782 MILLION TOTAL DOLLARS WERE PROCESSED DURING Q1 2018
* EXPECT RECORD ANNUAL REVENUES FOR 2018 * DURING Q1 OF 2018 ELECTRONIC CHECK TRANSACTION VOLUMES WERE UP 5% OVER Q4 OF 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
